articles.title: Bazzani: "Last year Milan didn't have so many lives, they didn't have this mentality"
articles.summary:
Fabio Bazzani, in the post-match of Pisa-Milan 1-2, talks about the performance of the Rossoneri who achieved a good away victory this evening.

“It's the confirmation of a team that doesn't give up in times of difficulty.

articles.title: Amelia believes it: "This Milan can really aspire to the Scudetto"
articles.summary: Marco Amelia, former AC Milan goalkeeper, spoke live on Sportitalia as a guest. His words on Milan: "In my opinion this Milan can really aspire to the Scudetto.

articles.title: Paradoxical, but it's like this: Milan beat a newly promoted team for the first time this season
articles.summary: Milan beat a newly promoted team for the first time this season. In the previous three games there had been a defeat at San Siro against Cremonese, on the first day of the championship, two draws against Pisa and Sassuolo at San Siro.

articles.title: Marianella: "Milan is increasingly the real alternative to Inter's solitary run"
articles.summary: The Milan won 1-2 in Pisa with a late goal from Luka Modric which puts the chestnuts out of the fire for the Rossoneri who thus find their first victory with a newly promoted team this season.

articles.title: Auriemma: "I think I can say that, realistically, it's a very complicated hypothesis that Napoli wins them all and Milan and Inter don't"
articles.summary: Raffaele Auriemma, a journalist of Neapolitan faith, expressed himself on Tele A as follows about Napoli and the Scudetto race: "If today we look at the result: Italian Super Cup and qualification for the Champions League, obviously we hope so...

articles.title: Milan, try it! Modric like Tonali. Rabiot different from Lautaro
articles.summary: 15 points more than last season is enormous. They represent a small sporting masterpiece.

articles.title: "I want to see a coach come to the conference and say 'I had an episode in my favor, I apologize'." Chivu, however, does not apologize and takes matters further after the Kalulu-Bastoni episode
articles.summary: After yesterday's almost philosophising statements in the conference about the referees, this evening Inter coach Chivu completely changed his tune.

articles.title: Chivu surprises everyone: "An experienced player like Kalulu has to keep his hands at home in some circumstances. Light touch, but it's a touch"
articles.summary: Christian Chivu, Inter coach, commented on Bastoni's simulation which led to Kalulu's expulsion in the post-match of Inter-Juventus.

articles.title: Chiellini's fury: "Something unacceptable happened for the umpteenth time this season. We can't talk about football tonight"
articles.summary: Giorgio Chiellini, director of football strategy of the Juventus club, spoke to Sky in place of Luciano Spalletti at the end of Inter-Juventus 3-2. Bianconeri furious at Kalulu's expulsion following a bad simulation by Bastoni.

articles.title: Milan is the team with the most penalties in favor in this Serie A: with yesterday's one there are 7 (of which 5 scored)
articles.summary: Milan is the team that has earned the most penalties in this Serie A (seven), Niclas Füllkrug's penalty is the second missed by the Rossoneri in the current championship (also Christian Pulisic vs Juventus in October).

articles.title: Kalulu expelled, Comolli, Spalletti and Chiellini furious: "It doesn't exist!"
articles.summary: Juventus falls 3-2 in the Italian Derby against Inter at San Siro, at the end of a match marked by strong controversy.

articles.title: Guidi: "Leao still at half serve, Pulisic debilitated and Fullkrug affected by the error on the penalty: Modric went on to take the victory"
articles.summary: Marco Guidi, journalist, expressed himself in La Gazzetta dello Sport about Luka Modric: "From the street to the oratory, up to Serie A, football works like this.

This is the updated ranking after Inter-Juventus 3-2.

articles.title: Serie A, Inter-Juventus 3-2: victory for the Nerazzurri amidst a thousand controversies
articles.summary: The Derby d'Italia ends 3-2 for Inter amidst a thousand controversies over the refereeing, as often happens when the Nerazzurri play.

articles.title: Pavlovic also takes care of the essentials on Instagram. "+3" is his post after Pisa-Milan
articles.summary: Milan beat Pisa 1-2 thanks to Luka Modric's goal in the 85th minute, which was decisive in channeling the result after the momentary equalizer scored by Ruben Loftus-Cheek for the Rossoneri and by Loyola for the Tuscans.

articles.title: Pisa is the opponent against whom Milan has the greatest number of precedents without ever having lost in Serie A
articles.summary: Pisa is the opponent against whom Milan has the highest number of precedents without ever losing in Serie A: 14 (11W, 3D). Opta reports it.

articles.title: Condò: "Milan faced Pisa with the haughty claim of not struggling"
articles.summary: Paolo Condò, journalist, expressed himself in the Corriere della Sera on Milan's performance: "A very classy play by Luka Modric allows Milan to escape the Pisa labyrinth at the last minute, faced with the sp ...

articles.title: Nobody in Europe does better than Milan for consecutive matches without any defeat
articles.summary: Milan (W15, D8 in the current tournament) equaled its third longest unbeaten run in a Serie A season (23 matches in a row, as between September 1992 and March 1993), behind only a run of 24 matches between December 1...

articles.title: Ceccarini: "Gila concrete hypothesis for Milan's defence"
articles.summary: In his editorial for tuttomercatoweb.com, Niccolò Ceccarini spoke thus of Milan's summer transfer market: "First the Champions League then a summer campaign with a very specific objective: a great striker.

articles.title: It hadn't happened since 2003-2004 that Milan remained unbeaten in their first 13 away games in the league
articles.summary: The Rossoneri remained without a knockout in the top 13 away games in Serie A for the first time since 2003/04 (W10, D3). Opta reports it.

articles.title: Pisa 1-2 AC Milan: Five things we learned – a true leader and smart choices
articles.summary:
AC Milan travelled to Pisa for a long-awaited clash, after ten days of rest, and managed to extend their winning run with a 1-2 scoreline.  Due to the rescheduled Como game, which will be played on Wednesday instead, Milan had a lot of time to prepare for this one. Yet, it ended up being a […]

articles.title: AC Milan Women 0-1 Fiorentina: Season target now difficult after muddy affair
articles.summary:
AC Milan Women lost for the second game in a row, as Fiorentina prevailed by the odd goal on a very muddy pitch. It has been a season filled with ups and downs for Milan Women so far. The fact that they have both six wins and six defeats perhaps says it all, and Champions […]
The post AC Milan Women

articles.title: Morata sent off as Como dropped points again ahead of Milan encounter – video
articles.summary: The former AC Milan player Alvaro Morata was sent off as Como dropped points again, losing 1-2 against Fiorentina, just days before the game against the Rossoneri.  Out of the next few games, including the one played yesterday, Como has always been described as the most difficult one for Milan. articles.title: Rabiot forced to tactical foul against Parma to avoid missing Milan-Inter
articles.summary: Adrien Rabiot might have some regrets about turning a yellow card into a red last night, as he now must make a tactical foul before the derby against Inter.  In the dying minutes of Pisa-Milan, which the Rossoneri won by two goals to one, Rabiot was shown a red card after two bookings. The first […]

articles.title: Photos: Milan players react to Pisa win on social media – “Always a great feeling”
articles.summary: After the crucial win against Pisa last night, some of the AC Milan players sent messages to the fans through their social media accounts.  Thanks to goals from Ruben Loftus-Cheek and Luka Modric, one in each half, Milan prevailed 2-1 against Pisa. It was a crucial win in the Scudetto race as the ga

articles.title: GdS: Everton’s stadium one of many study visits as Milan proceed with San Siro plan
articles.summary: AC Milan recently sent a delegation to study Everton’s new home, the Hill Dickinson Stadium, as the San Siro plans are progressing according to plan.  After getting the green light from the city council for the sale of San Siro last year, Milan have since been working on the bureaucracy and paperwor

articles.summary: Delegates from Milan have been in Liverpool to visit and study Everton’s new Hill Dickinson...

articles.title: Athekame’s crossing proving to be a weapon for Milan in season finale
articles.summary: Zachary Athekame has certainly responded to the initial criticism in recent weeks by showcasing his great crossing several times, including against Pisa last night.  Few knew who Athekame was when he arrived from Young Boys in the summer. articles.title: Milan Futuro 1-0 Breno: Sardo and Traore lead the way for Oddo’s side
articles.summary: Milan Futuro returned to winning ways against Breno this afternoon, largely thanks to the performances of Jacopo Sardo and Chaka Traore. articles.title: Watch: Allegri lets his emotions out after Modric’s crucial winner against Pisa
articles.summary: Massimiliano Allegri is known for showing his emotions in the dugout, especially at the end of games, and yesterday was no exception as Luka Modric scored the winner.  If there’s one thing that Milan fans have understood 24 games into the season, it’s that Allegri truly immerses himself in each game

articles.title: Ricci and Jashari licking their lips amid Rabiot’s suspension for Milan-Como
articles.summary: AC Milan will be without their star midfielder Adrien Rabiot for the game against Como on Wednesday, with Ardon Jashari and Samuele Ricci both eyeing a chance from start.  It was in the dying minute of yesterday’s 2-1 win against Pisa that Rabiot got sent off. He first received a yellow card for a f

articles.title: Genoa 1-2 Milan Primavera: Early red card paves the way for the Rossoneri
articles.summary: A negative trend was thankfully reversed for Milan Primavera this afternoon, as they collected all points from their game against Genoa.  After three games without a win, including two defeats, Milan Primavera managed to get back to winning ways this afternoon. Despite the poor run of form lately, t

articles.title: Watch: Relive Pisa-Milan as Modric scores the winner late on – the highlights
articles.summary: It ended up being a complicated away trip to Pisa for Milan, who were rescued by their veteran Luka Modric in the dying minutes.  After taking the lead through Ruben Loftus-Cheek in the first half, it seemed like it would be a comfortable evening for Milan, especially since they dominated play befor

articles.title: Man on a mission and runs equalled: All the key stats from Pisa vs. AC Milan
articles.summary: AC Milan extended their unbeaten run to 23 games, and their winning run to to games, after scoring twice against Pisa last night.  Goals from Ruben Loftus-Cheek and Luka Modric were enough to secure all three points for the Rossoneri, but as we will get into, it wasn’t as easy as they perhaps would

articles.title: Füllkrug ‘relieved’ after missing penalty against Pisa: “Definitely had better days”
articles.summary: Niclas Füllkrug published a message for the AC Milan fans on Instagram this morning, after missing a penalty in the Rossoneri’s 2-1 win against Pisa. It was in the 56th minute that Füllkrug stepped up to take the penalty for Milan. The scoreline was 0-1 then, meaning a goal would have doubled the le

articles.title: Photo: Rabiot sends signal to Pisa-Milan referee with Instagram story
articles.summary: Adrien Rabiot has sent a message to the Pisa-Milan referee, and the officiating team in general, with a story on Instagram. articles.summary: Pisa manager Oscar Hljemark believes his side played a perfect game tactically against Milan, despite coming away with zero points in the end.  After the 2-2 draw in the reverse fixture, Milan headed into the game with a lust for revenge. articles.summary: Niclas Füllkrug was very disappointed after his penalty miss against Pisa and was consoled by Rafael Leao, as well as other teammates, after the final whistle.  At half-time, Massimiliano Allegri decided to replace Christopher Nkunku with Füllkrug. articles.title: CorSera: ‘The dreamcatcher’ – Modric continues to keep Milan’s Scudetto dream alive
articles.summary: Luka Modric scored the winner for AC Milan against Pisa, showing once again just how important he is, and there has been no shortage of praise for him this morning.  At the age of 40, it’s simply incredible what Modric has brought to the team this season. articles.title: Why Füllkrug’s penalty wasn’t retaken despite obvious encroachment
articles.summary: Niclas Füllkrug missed a penalty for AC Milan in their 2-1 win against Pisa last night, but many have been asking why it wasn’t retaken due to obvious encroachment. articles.title: Obvious MOTM and flop: Player ratings for Pisa-Milan from Italian papers
articles.summary:
